quality_check_questions.thinking_process: To ensure the photo has been converted correctly, we focus on confirming the style change.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the photo been converted into a minimalist flat illustration-style sticker?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: We check if the desired outlines are preserved accurately.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the boy and all bird outlines clearly present in the illustration?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: We evaluate if the specified color type was correctly implemented.
quality_check_questions.question: Have block colors been used for the boy's skin tones and the birds' feathers?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirming if the background removal was successful involves observing the absence of any backdrop.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the background completely removed from the image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Checking the adjustments made to the subjects—enlargement and shrinking—to confirm compliance with the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the boy’s head been slightly enlarged and the birds shrunk to achieve a neatly arranged composition?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Verifying the addition of a specific outline element confirms adherence to the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Has a thick white outline been added around the boy and birds?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirming the transparency of the background checks if post-processing aligns with the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the image have a transparent background?
